SELECT distinct co.id,co.name,telephone,picture,video, content,category_id,reply,ca.id as cid,ca.name as caname,
ca.create_date as cacreate_date,ca.create_user as cacreate_user, ca.update_date as caupdate_date,ca.update_user as caupdate_user
from zmj_consult co join zmj_category ca on category_id=ca.id where co.del!=1 and ca.del!=1
and co.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
or ca.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY co.create_date desc
